## CCSelectorCombinedProps.gridItemProps property

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Props passed to the MUI Grid item components if the country code components are wrapped in such. Is overwritten by `gridSelectorProps` and `gridInputProps`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
gridItemProps?: GridItemProps;
```
